Reviews.Title: Not a great mount for snowboards
Reviews.Author: pwr1220
Reviews.Content: I recently mounted these on my snowboard for a snowboard trip to VT and they did not last long. All four mounts popped off very quickly and were lost in the snow - thankfully I did not have my GoPro mounted at the time. I will not fault GoPro for this since these are marketed as surfboard mounts and maybe the adhesive works better on on a surfboard.Just wanted to pass along my experience to anyone out these thinking of using these for a snowboard.

Reviews.Title: Great mounts
Reviews.Author: Bongoray
Reviews.Content: Not much to say other than the mounts work great. Easy to apply & they've held up to some impressive wakeboarding wipe outs.

Reviews.Title: go pro surf board mounts
Reviews.Author: Moire "moire d."
Reviews.Content: these extra mounts work just like the ones that come with a go pro.having extras are nice if you ride more than one or two boards.

Reviews.Title: surf board mounts stay on great, the videos come out clear.
Reviews.Author: mjgidget
Reviews.Content: they stay on the surfboard, even in wild rough waves....i am impressed how clear the video comes out and how steady the camera is on the mounts

Reviews.Title: Not quite as expected
Reviews.Author: Dave Roberts
Reviews.Content: Some time ago GoPro updated this product from one large sticky mount, to 2 smaller stick mounts (as pictured). The ones we received were the old versions, not the new versions as pictured. Still a good product, but not what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: Surfing
Reviews.Author: Serge Roy
Reviews.Content: Used it during a trip to Costa Rica. It did not improve my surfing skills but I have great memories.

Reviews.Title: Complete rip off
Reviews.Author: Collin Lewis
Reviews.Content: It came off the second time I used it and it wasn't even during a big swell!!! This product is a total rip off

Reviews.Title: Surfs up
Reviews.Author: K-Rog
Reviews.Content: Now I can record and watch movies of myself surfing.  Serves its intended purpose and am happy with the white color.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Renee Rector
Reviews.Content: It worked great, Got some great video and photos. First epic picture I have ever had for me surfing.This is her Husband Stan!!

Reviews.Title: Happy hubby
Reviews.Author: Runyoncrew
Reviews.Content: My husband has been showing me great footage he's captured from his go pro mounted on his surf board. I asked him how everything is holding up and he has no complaints on the durability and strength if these mounts. He's a happy guy.

Reviews.Title: Good mounts
Reviews.Author: kallison
Reviews.Content: Good mounts, but there is a surf kit on the market with the mounts and a floater. Seems like a better option considering you use these in the water. Mounts work just fine though, but would've rather got the other kit in hindsight.

Reviews.Title: gopro srfboard mounts
Reviews.Author: Rita
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son, it was a gift. It was really cool. My cousin who lives in the USA recommended me to buy in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Work great!
Reviews.Author: Bodhi
Reviews.Content: Put one of these mounts on the back of my boat, the other on my wakeboard.  Provides safe anchor points for catching some awesome action videos!

Reviews.Title: Passed the test
Reviews.Author: TJW
Reviews.Content: My son has used these on both his surfboard and skim board.  The seem sturdy and have stayed securely attached.  The "back-up" security mechanism provides some added comfort that the $300 GoPro camera will not be lost in the Gulf of Mexico.  By the way, once you attached this item, do not plan to remove it and use it on another piece of equipment.  Just buy several mounts and keep them attached to the equipment.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Mount for Gopro
Reviews.Author: Kevyn Fox
Reviews.Content: The mounts for the surfboard worked really well but this product didn't come with a mount for the actual gopro. I was disappointed and had to separately purchase the mount for the camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Holden Taylor
Reviews.Content: It worked well for a while, but it ended up breaking within a month. I am severely disappointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: Works as it is suppose to….
Reviews.Author: jaodhan
Reviews.Content: I had to find instructions on-line for how to properly install the mounts but once I did and I applied them they worked fine and are still on the board. Have yet to use in larger than chest high surf.

Reviews.Title: same
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: not much to say. got the second pair because got more boards. I have it on my surfboard, paddleboard and kiteboard.

Reviews.Title: Tried for snow.
Reviews.Author: Sonny Lynn Vick
Reviews.Content: I tried these on my snowboard and skis when skiing a month ago and first thing the mount popped off without a camera even on it. May work better on Surfboards

Reviews.Title: GoPro Surfboard Mount
Reviews.Author: Randy Rhodes
Reviews.Content: The GoPro Surfboard mount works flawlessly to attach my GoPro to my surfboard. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Nick Pullano
Reviews.Content: I put these on my 7'0" hybrid fish for my GoPro Hero 3 and so far so good. I've been out 4 times and there have been no signs coming off.

Reviews.Title: super good, works well
Reviews.Author: Chas
Reviews.Content: I have this mount. super strong adhesive, WILL NOT COME OFF WHILE SURFING. stays on even during the worst wipeouts. WORKS ON ALL SURFBOARDS. great quality, must have for surfers. highly recommend. lanyard + lanyard mount works great too. makes you feel much more secure.

Reviews.Title: QUICK!!!
Reviews.Author: Alex Duarte
Reviews.Content: Amazon prime never disappoints.  I ordered this on a monday and got it on wednesday.  5 stars for quick delivery and the product being perfectly in tact!  Excellent job!  Highly recommended gopro add on if you surf......its a must!  Protect your investment!

Reviews.Title: Rock solid hold
Reviews.Author: J. Lanza "The Machine"
Reviews.Content: This mount is great. After a thorough cleaning of the contact area with rubbing alcohol, this bad boy stuck like cement.

Reviews.Title: First one fell off in the first 24 hours
Reviews.Author: MattSz
Reviews.Content: I bought these before Thanksgiving and put one on my Surftech surfboard.  The next day I took my board and camera out to the Cape and surfed some 5 foot beach break.  During one wave my body bumped into the GoPro and the camera popped right off.  It ended up being saved due to the safety cord, but my board got a nice ding from the camera hitting it.  I've seen these being used by tons of surfers both amateur and pro so maybe they work well as long as there not bumped, but be aware that if the camera comes off that you may end up with a big ding in your board or without a camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Secure
Reviews.Author: Ronald Christie
Reviews.Content: Used them to mount the GoPro to my kid's wake board. They held the camera securley and we captured some awesome video.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: 49er guy
Reviews.Content: Surfs up bro, wanna show everyone just how awesome you are? of course you why else would you be looking at these. Use these bad boys to attach your Go Pro and capture some epic footage. Be sure to follow directions and allow the adhesive the allotted 24hrs to bonds to your board. I didn't and as a result almost lost my Go Pro. Thankfully, I had the floaty attached and retrieved my camera. After, following directions and allowing the mount the proper time to bond to my board I have not had any other near disasters with my Go Pro and believe me I wipe out a lot and often fail to turtle roll on my long board and just dive under waves hoping my leash will bring my board to me.

Reviews.Title: Great mounts. They work.
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: Been out surfing with these 3 times now. Zero issues what so ever. I only really thing that somehow we should be able to leash the go pro housing to the extra safety leash, not just put it in the screw area. But I have had no issues with loosing my go pro or anything of that sort.

Reviews.Title: Great Price for a Great Product
Reviews.Author: Mikaele
Reviews.Content: Glad I found this set on Amazon. The price is right, I get 2 universal surf mounts, tethers, and an FCS mount for my GoPro! I've used these mounts on 2 of my SUPs and decided to put the mounts on ALL my boards.

Reviews.Title: Item necessary for wet locations
Reviews.Author: Victor Grindstaff
Reviews.Content: This mounts are a definite improvement over the suction cup mount I was using on my surfboards and I also mounted one on a kayak

Reviews.Title: Solid performers
Reviews.Author: Berg
Reviews.Content: Mounted these on my surfboards - just make sure you line them up so the camera is facing the right way before you commit to sticking them down!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Cale Ogle
Reviews.Content: I use mine on my wakeboard and on my water skiis and they work beautifully. I would recommend using them on any board, the extra surface area makes them more stable and sturdy than the regular adhesive mounts, plus the included tethers provide extra confidence in the safety of your camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: JPre39
Reviews.Content: So far, so good! Taken it out twice now...strong hold and seems like its doing the job!  I recommend also getting the Floaty back door as well just in case!

Reviews.Title: Strong and reliable
Reviews.Author: Barry King
Reviews.Content: I used the mount on my helmet while whitewater rafting and it worked great. I fell in a few times and hit the botom of the raft. The camera mount itself is strong and the safety tether is just as strong. Never fell off my helmet.

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised on my SUP
Reviews.Author: Dock4
Reviews.Content: I purchased these mounts for use on my Stand Up Paddleboards.  They are easy to install and hold well.  I have not had my GoPro detach from my boards at all.  The only downside to these mounts is that they are a permanent mount, and once affixed to the board, cannot be re mounted.

Reviews.Title: really good
Reviews.Author: Bora
Reviews.Content: Really helps you out while surfingyou have a second option to put in the back of the board. to make really nice videosI recomend

Reviews.Title: Works great so far
Reviews.Content: They don't come with instructions which I thought was a little weird, but there are plenty of Youtube videos to help you out. Something they don't tell you is that you need to not get your board wet for 24 HOURS after applying the mount, or you risk losing your GoPro (I bet that's what happened to some people here). I've used it in the water several times, and they've worked great so far!

Reviews.Title: Work very well
Reviews.Author: Jen B "Jen B"
Reviews.Content: We love our Go Pro and these mounts make it easy to attach the Go Pro to a surfboard. We have the greatest videos now :)

Reviews.Title: Work Perfectly
Reviews.Author: BRENDAN WENZEL
Reviews.Content: Make sure you clean your board first and then apply. Do that and it should never come off. Mine has been through hell and back.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: greg erskine
Reviews.Content: I've gone out surfing two times now in 2-3 foot waves.  Never even close to losing it.  Definitely get the floaty back door as a backup.

Reviews.Title: Holding tight
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rogness
Reviews.Content: So far, no issues with these mounts.  From County Line, Ventura and Oxnard, to the Central coast; so far, not one mount has dislodged.  I'll update after summer once we start our northern swell if there are any issues, but so far, no probs.PS: On my winter boards I also placed a sheet of fiberglass and resin over the mounts with the slot for the camera left open.  If I encounter any waves that rip it off, I'd be hard pressed to blame the mount as having them glassed in would mean the wave is just that gnarly.  I truly believe the nose will break off before the mount does.  If you don't want to go through the trouble of glassing in the mount, a little Solar-Rez overlapping the mount to the board should provide a little extra protection.  just be sure to sand a rough surface on both the board and mount before you do.

Reviews.Title: Slapped em on the wakeboard... worked great.
Reviews.Author: AJ Tundra
Reviews.Content: The mounts work great.  That said, I could see these work great for Surfboards.  Higher impact sports (like wakeboarding or snowboarding), the camera gets jostled around on the mount.  It just won't stay pointed where you want it, no matter how hard you crank it down.However, that is not the mounts fault.  These things adhere nicely, with more surface area... which makes all the difference.  5 Stars.

Reviews.Title: SO far so good
Reviews.Author: Marissa Munton
Reviews.Content: they stick nicely to my board and I haven't had it fall off yet. I tested it with the empty housing to make sure it didn't come off and it didn't.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: BS
Reviews.Content: These things work really well and are a lot smaller than the original GoPro surfboard mounts. I mounted one on the curved part of the nose of my shortboard where it didn't even make full contact, and it's still going strong months later.

Reviews.Title: Nice current-style board mounts
Reviews.Author: L. Pipes
Reviews.Content: Needed new mounts for other boards in my quiver.  These do the job, I have yet to have one come off...

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mutpowr
Reviews.Content: Been using this a lot to surf in the north west where the waves crash/cap pretty fast.  Never had my gopro come off from using these.  Just i wanted more for different surf boards / wakeboards i have.

Reviews.Title: Works, but plastic attachments break easily.
Reviews.Author: TJ Hanes-Innes
Reviews.Content: My son loves his GoPro, and uses many different types of attachments.  The surfboard mounts did not break, but the black mount on the camera that slides in breaks easily, and broke at the beach when he was sliding the camera into the mount.  We have had to replace them twice.  He still loves his camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and cheap compared to the stores
Reviews.Author: Timothy Gass
Reviews.Content: Love the double suction! Just in case. Although I have popped one off before the back up held my gopro on and granted I went over the falls on a 8-10ft Hawaiian style wave (15-20ft face). Very much a must buy for surfers with GoPros.

Reviews.Title: just works
Reviews.Author: johnny appleseed
Reviews.Content: i bought the 16 boy a go-pro for x-mas. of course the whole reason behind that was so he can mount camera to surfboard. so with a few key strokes on amazon......*POOF* 2 days later he has all the mounts he needs to get his surf videos underway. of course the mount are working as described and he loves them. quality product for sure!

Reviews.Title: Product Accurate as the picture
Reviews.Author: Max E. Miron Morales "Max Miron"
Reviews.Content: These are exactly as the picture the new version of these surfboard mounts, the small ones,, original product ,, im very satisfied with the product and now ready to use it with my surfboard and start to have fun =) recomended

Reviews.Title: Not good for skis
Reviews.Author: Jody Grigg "14er lover"
Reviews.Content: Yes I know they are so called surfboard mounts but like a lot of people I bought them to use on a pair of skis. I placed them on a brand new pair of skis, so the surface was clean, let them sit for over 24 hours to get a good grip. Went out skiing without my GoPro to test the mounts the larger one lasted one run the backup small mount lasted 3 runs before I lost them. Not recommend for skis!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Matthew Donlan
Reviews.Content: My son is not a pro but he is a good solid surfer. We had just purchased the surf mount along with the orange floaty for extra protection. We were testing it out on some two-foot waves. He fell off his board, hit the camera with his body and the whole thing, including the leash sticker came right off. He only weighs 80 pounds. We thought, no big deal, we have the orange floaty on it, it will come back up. Well, the orange floaty came up, but without the camera! It had also failed miserably. We lost the camera after only using it for 20 minutes because both the mount AND the floaty failed. Just be aware that you still have to be extra careful with this. I would recommend drilling the mount into the board somehow and not rely on a simple sticker mount to protect your $300.00 investment.

Reviews.Title: swe
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: havent use it yet but it looks like a promis. i myself am going to use it on my kayack hopefully everyting works out! shipping fast and easy excellent buy

Maximum attach for when the most strength is needed - Surf, Paddle, Kayak, Boat Deck, etc.
Includes 2 Surfboard Mounts, 2 Camera Tethers, 2 Tether Straps, 1 FCS Plug, and 1 Rubber Locking Plug
Compatible with HD HERO, HERO Naked, and HERO2 cameras
ProductInfo.Name: GoPro Surf Camera Mounts
